name: Triple match
description:
A puzzlescript game inspired by match 3 games with the goal being to remove all blocks in the level.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=195dfb1d5adfcf2133a5990a65c77e1b

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=195dfb1d5adfcf2133a5990a65c77e1b

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
